analysis.name: SOLIDITY_EXTRA_GAS_IN_LOOPS
analysis.content: for(uinti=0;i<requestedAssets.length;++i){ofAsset=requestedAssets[i];require(isInAssetList[ofAsset]);for(uintj=0;j<redeemedAssets.length;j++){if(ofAsset==redeemedAssets[j]){revert();}}redeemedAssets[i]=ofAsset;uintassetHoldings=add(uint(AssetInterface(ofAsset).balanceOf(address(this))),quantityHeldInCustodyOfExchange(ofAsset));if(assetHoldings==0)continue;ownershipQuantities[i]=mul(assetHoldings,shareQuantity)/_totalSupply;if(uint(AssetInterface(ofAsset).balanceOf(address(this)))<ownershipQuantities[i]){isShutDown=true;emitErrorMessage("CRITICAL ERR: Not enough assetHoldings for owed ownershipQuantitiy");returnfalse;}}

analysis.name: SOLIDITY_GAS_LIMIT_IN_LOOPS
analysis.content: for(uinti=0;i<requestedAssets.length;++i){ofAsset=requestedAssets[i];require(isInAssetList[ofAsset]);for(uintj=0;j<redeemedAssets.length;j++){if(ofAsset==redeemedAssets[j]){revert();}}redeemedAssets[i]=ofAsset;uintassetHoldings=add(uint(AssetInterface(ofAsset).balanceOf(address(this))),quantityHeldInCustodyOfExchange(ofAsset));if(assetHoldings==0)continue;ownershipQuantities[i]=mul(assetHoldings,shareQuantity)/_totalSupply;if(uint(AssetInterface(ofAsset).balanceOf(address(this)))<ownershipQuantities[i]){isShutDown=true;emitErrorMessage("CRITICAL ERR: Not enough assetHoldings for owed ownershipQuantitiy");returnfalse;}}
